attributes.action: No covid vaccinations for children of all ages
attributes.additional_details: With the ever increasing fatalities and side effects, There is absolutely no justification for vaccinating children, This is an experiment and to inject children who cause no risk is unethical, There is no long term data and the government have a duty of care to insist that the vaccine program be withdrawn from experiments on children Healthy children are at low risk from COVID-19 yet face known and unknown risks from COVID-19 vaccines.
attributes.background: Healthy children are at low risk from COVID-19 yet face known and unknown risks from COVID-19 vaccines.
